content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good afternoon, Juan. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I believe we can come to an agreement on the rental price. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My proposed price is 800 Euros per month. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your proposal, Juan. While 800 Euros per month is certainly a reasonable amount for a 25 square meter apartment in New York, I must admit that I am looking for a higher price. Would you be willing to consider a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Of course, I am willing to negotiate. What do you have in mind?

I was thinking something around 900 Euros per month. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Juan. While 900 Euros per month is a bit higher than my initial proposal, I am willing to consider it. However, I must admit that I am still looking for a higher rental price. Would you be willing to consider a rental price of 1000 Euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine
